SELECT MS_SI_KOUSHU_ID,
NAME, YUKOKIGEN_STR, YUKOKIGEN_DAYS,
DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS
FROM MS_SI_KOUSHU
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO MS_SI_KOUSHU( MS_SI_KOUSHU_ID ,
NAME , YUKOKIGEN_STR , YUKOKIGEN_DAYS ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( nextval('SEQ_MS_SI_KOUSHU_ID'), :NAME ,
:YUKOKIGEN_STR , :YUKOKIGEN_DAYS ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SI_KOUSHU SET NAME = :NAME , YUKOKIGEN_STR = :YUKOKIGEN_STR , YUKOKIGEN_DAYS = :YUKOKIGEN_DAYS ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SI_KOUSHU_ID = :MS_SI_KOUSHU_ID AND TS = :TS
